source-layers.sql: SELECT the_geom_webmercator, boroname AS borough FROM boroughs_v0
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, school_dis AS district FROM school_districts_v2017
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, schooldist AS district, zone AS subdistrict FROM doe_schoolsubdistricts_v2017
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, district, subd AS subdistrict FROM doe_bluebook_v1617 WHERE charter != 'Charter'
